segments.text: Hey , Jim . I didn ’ t know you biked to work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , it helps keep me fit and helps the environment , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One less car on the road means less pollution .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right . Since my work is near a park , it ’ s a really nice ride , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , about 10 miles . It takes me about an hour .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That doesn ’ t sound too bad . I wish I could do it , but I work in the city . So I take the train .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ re doing your part for the environment by using public transportation , too .
segments.speaker: S2
